name: Colour Temple
description:
You end up in a temple with misterious coloured block that appear and dissapear depending on your actions. How will you escape?

This game was made as an assingment for my college.

Every thing in this game was made by me with a few exceptions:

- The code for the ?! blocks and the switch (not the powerup) was made by PolyMars. Link to his youtube video and Github repository here:                                                                         Youtube: 

Github: https://github.com/PolyMarsDev/Mario-Maker-Deconstructed

- The camera transitions were made with the help of BenBonk. Youtube link here: 

- Finally the victory sound effect was taken from Mixxit with the name "Winning Chimes". Link here: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/win/
